abstract.t: This memo presents a method for a client to prefix commands sent toan IRC (Internet Relay Chat) server with a label, in order to matchserver replies against commands previously sent, without having tokeep excessive state on the server connection. It is a primarygoal to implement this in a way which is completely backwards-compatible with existing IRC servers.This documents describes an extention to the Internet Relay Chatprotocol as described in RFC 1459 [1].
